cards.name: Adventurer
cards.description: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

cards.name: Bureaucrat
cards.description: Gain a Silver Card: put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards)

cards.name: Cellar
cards.description: Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.

cards.name: Chancellor
cards.description: You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

cards.name: Chapel
cards.description: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

cards.name: Council Room
cards.description: Each other player draws a card.

cards.name: Feast
cards.description: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 coins.

cards.name: Gardens
cards.description: Worth 1 VP for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

cards.name: Library
cards.description: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them, discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

cards.name: Militia
cards.description: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

cards.name: Mine
cards.description: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 coins more, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Moat
cards.description: [Action]: Draw 2 cards. [Reaction]: When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that attack.

cards.name: Moneylender
cards.description: Trash a Copper card from your hand. If you do, +3 coins.

cards.name: Remodel
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 coins more than the trashed card.

cards.name: Spy
cards.description: Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

cards.name: Thief
cards.description: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed ant Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

cards.name: Throne Room
cards.description: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it Twice.

cards.name: Witch
cards.description: Each other player gains a Curse card.

cards.name: Workshop
cards.description: Gain a card costing up to 4 coins.

cards.name: Black Market
cards.description: Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. You may buy one of them immediately. Put the unbought cards on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order. (Before the game, make a Black Market deck out of one copy of each Kingdom card not in the supply.)

cards.name: Envoy
cards.description: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to the left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.

cards.name: Baron
cards.description: You may discard an estate card. If you do, +4 Coin. Otherwise, gain an estate card.

cards.name: Bridge
cards.description: All cards (including cards in players� hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but no less than 0 Coin.

cards.name: Conspirator
cards.description: If you played 3 or more actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action

cards.name: Coppersmith
cards.description: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.

cards.name: Courtyard
cards.description: Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

cards.name: Duke
cards.description: Worth 1 VP for each Duchy you have.

cards.name: Ironworks
cards.description: Gain a card costing up to 4 coins. If it is an� Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +1 Coin. Victory card, +1 Card.

cards.name: Masquerade
cards.description: Each player passes a card from his hand to the left at once. Then you may trash a card from your hand.

cards.name: Mining Village
cards.description: You may trash this card immediately, If you do, +2 coins.

cards.name: Minion
cards.description: Choose one: +2 coins, or discard your hand, + 4 cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

cards.name: Nobles
cards.description: Choose one: +3 cards, or +2 actions.

cards.name: Pawn
cards.description: Choose two: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin. (The choices must be different)

cards.name: Saboteur
cards.description: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

cards.name: Scout
cards.description: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top your deck in any order.

cards.name: Secret Chamber
cards.description: [Action]: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin for per card discarded. [Reaction]: When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

cards.name: Shanty Town
cards.description: Reveal your hand. If you have no actions cards in hand, +2 cards.

cards.name: Steward
cards.description: Choose one: +2 cards, or +2 coins, or trash 2 cards from your hand.

cards.name: Swindler
cards.description: Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card of the same cost that you choose.

cards.name: Torturer
cards.description: Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards, or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

cards.name: Trading Post
cards.description: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a Silver card, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Tribute
cards.description: The player to your left reveals and then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each different named card revealed, if it is an... Action card, +2 actions, Treasure card, +2 coins, Victory Card, +2 cards

cards.name: Upgrade
cards.description: Trash a card form your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

cards.name: Wishing Well
cards.description: Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it�s the named card, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Ambassador
cards.description: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

cards.name: Caravan
cards.description: At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

cards.name: Cutpurse
cards.description: Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

cards.name: Embargo
cards.description: Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

cards.name: Explorer
cards.description: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

cards.name: Fishing Village
cards.description: At the start of your next turn: +1 Action, +1 Coin.

cards.name: Ghost Ship
cards.description: Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

cards.name: Haven
cards.description: Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Island
cards.description: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.

cards.name: Lighthouse
cards.description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn�t affect you.

cards.name: Lookout
cards.description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

cards.name: Merchant Ship
cards.description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 coins.

cards.name: Native Village
cards.description: Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat, or put all the cards from your mat into your hand. You may look at the cards on your mat at any time, return them to your deck at the end of the game.

cards.name: Navigator
cards.description: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Outpost
cards.description: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn�s Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can�t cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

cards.name: Pearl Diver
cards.description: Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

cards.name: Pirate Ship
cards.description: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token, or, +1 Coin per Coin token you�ve taken with Pirate Ships this game.

cards.name: Salvager
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. + Coin equal to its cost.

cards.name: Sea Hag
cards.description: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

cards.name: Smugglers
cards.description: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

cards.name: Tactician
cards.description: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.

cards.name: Treasure Map
cards.description: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

cards.name: Treasury
cards.description: When you discard this from play, if you didn�t buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

cards.name: Warehouse
cards.description: Discard 3 cards.

cards.name: Wharf
cards.description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 cards, +1 Buy.

cards.name: Alchemist
cards.description: When you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a potion in play.

cards.name: Apothecary
cards.description: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Apprentice
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. +1 Card per Coin it costs. +2 cards if it has <potion> in its cost.

cards.name: Familiar
cards.description: Each other player gains a Curse.

cards.name: Golem
cards.description: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem cards. Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

cards.name: Herbalist
cards.description: When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

cards.name: Philosopher's Stone
cards.description: When you play this, count your deck and discard pile. Worth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

cards.name: Possession
cards.description: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him. Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead, any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his deck.

cards.name: Scrying Pool
cards.description: Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn�t an Action. Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.

cards.name: Transmute
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. If it is a�  Action card, gain a Duchy. Treasure card, gain a Transmute. Victory card, gain a Gold.

cards.name: University
cards.description: You may gain an Action card costing up to 5 coins.

cards.name: Vineyard
cards.description: Worth 1 VP for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

cards.name: Bank
cards.description: When you play this, it�s worth 1 Coin per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

cards.name: City
cards.description: If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Coin and +1 Buy.

cards.name: Contraband
cards.description: When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can�t buy that card this turn.

cards.name: Counting House
cards.description: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

cards.name: Expand
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 coins more than the trashed card.

cards.name: Forge
cards.description: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.

cards.name: Goons
cards.description: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 VP.

cards.name: Grand Market
cards.description: You can�t buy this if you have any Copper in play.

cards.name: Hoard
cards.description: While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

cards.name: King's Court
cards.description: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

cards.name: Loan
cards.description: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

cards.name: Mint
cards.description: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it. then you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

cards.name: Mountebank
cards.description: Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn�t, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

cards.name: Peddler
cards.description: During your Buy phase, this costs 2 coins less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0 Coin.

cards.name: Quarry
cards.description: While this is in play, Action cards cost 2 coins less, but not less than 0 Coin.

cards.name: Rabble
cards.description: Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

cards.name: Royal Seal
cards.description: While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

cards.name: Talisman
cards.description: While this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

cards.name: Trade Route
cards.description: +1 Coin per token on the Trade Route mat. Trash a card from your hand. [Setup]: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

cards.name: Vault
cards.description: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

cards.name: Venture
cards.description: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

cards.name: Watchtower
cards.description: [Action]: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand. [Reaction]: When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Fairgrounds
cards.description: Worth 2 VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (rounded down).

cards.name: Farming Village
cards.description: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

cards.name: Fortune Teller
cards.description: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards  the other revealed cards.

cards.name: Hamlet
cards.description: You may discard a card, if you do +1 Action. You may discard a card, if you do +1 Buy.

cards.name: Harvest
cards.description: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

cards.name: Horn of Plenty
cards.description: When you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it�s a Victory card, trash this.

cards.name: Horse Traders
cards.description: [Action]: Discard 2 cards. [Reaction]: When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

cards.name: Hunting Party
cards.description: Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn�t a duplicate of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and discard the rest.

cards.name: Jester
cards.description: Each other player discards the top card of his deck. If it�s a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

cards.name: Menagerie
cards.description: Reveal your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.

cards.name: Remake
cards.description: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand then gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.

cards.name: Tournament
cards.description: Each player may reveal a Provence from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no one else does, +1 Card, +1 Coin.

cards.name: Young Witch
cards.description: Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand. If he doesn�t, he gains a Curse. [Set-up]: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing 2 coins or 3 coins to the supply. cards from that pile are Bane cards.

cards.name: Border Village
cards.description: When you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.

cards.name: Cache
cards.description: When you gain this, gain two Coppers.

cards.name: Cartographer
cards.description: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

cards.name: Crossroads
cards.description: Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played Crossroads this turn, +3 actions.

cards.name: Develop
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 Coin less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

cards.name: Duchess
cards.description: Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back. In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

cards.name: Embassy
cards.description: Discard 3 cards. When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

cards.name: Farmland
cards.description: When you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 2 coins more than the trashed card.

cards.name: Fool's Gold
cards.description: [Treasure]: If this is the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, this is worth 1 Coin, otherwise it's worth 4 coins. [Reaction]: When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.

cards.name: Haggler
cards.description: While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

cards.name: Highway
cards.description: While this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less, but not less than 0 coins.

cards.name: Ill-Gotten Gains
cards.description: When you play this, may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand. When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.

cards.name: Inn
cards.description: Discard 2 cards. When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.

cards.name: Jack of all Trades
cards.description: Gain a Silver. Look at the top card of your deck, discard it or put it back. Draw until you have 5 cards in hand. You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

cards.name: Mandarin
cards.description: Put a card from your hand on top of your deck. When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Margrave
cards.description: Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

cards.name: Noble Brigand
cards.description: When you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn't reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.

cards.name: Nomad Camp
cards.description: When you gain this, put it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Oasis
cards.description: Discard a card.

cards.name: Oracle
cards.description: Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses.

cards.name: Scheme
cards.description: At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

cards.name: Silk Road
cards.description: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

cards.name: Spice Merchant
cards.description: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. If you do, choose one: +2 cards and +1 Action, or +2 coins and +1 Buy.

cards.name: Stables
cards.description: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 cards and +1 Action.

cards.name: Trader
cards.description: [Action]: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of silvers equal to its cost in coins. [Reaction]: When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a silver.

cards.name: Tunnel
cards.description: When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.

cards.name: Madman
cards.description: Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Mercenary
cards.description: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, + $2, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Spoils
cards.description: When you play this, return it to the pile.

cards.name: Poor House
cards.description: Reveal your hand. -$1 per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of $0.

cards.name: Beggar
cards.description: [Action]: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand. [Reaction]: When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.

cards.name: Squire
cards.description: [Action]: Choose one: +2 actions; or +2 buys; or gain a Silver. [Trash]: When you trash this, gain an Attack card.

cards.name: Vagrant
cards.description: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it�s a Victory card, Curse, Ruins, or Shelter, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Hermit
cards.description: [Action]: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card that is not a Treasure, from your discard pile or your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3. [Discard]: When you discard this from play, if you didn�t buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman (from the Madman pile).

cards.name: Forager
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. +$1 per differently named Treasure in the trash.

cards.name: Market Square
cards.description: [Reaction]: When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

cards.name: Sage
cards.description: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing $3 or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

cards.name: Storeroom
cards.description: Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded the second time.

cards.name: Urchin
cards.description: [Action] Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand. [Attack] When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

cards.name: Armory
cards.description: Gain a card costing up to $4. Put it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Death Cart
cards.description: [Action]: You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don�t, trash this. [Gain]: When you gain this, gain two Ruins.

cards.name: Feodum
cards.description: [Action]: Worth 1 VP for every 3 Silvers in your deck. [Trash]: When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

cards.name: Fortress
cards.description: [Trash]: When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

cards.name: Ironmonger
cards.description: Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. If it is an Action card, +1 Action; a Treasure card, +$1; a Victory card, +1 Card.

cards.name: Marauder
cards.description: Gain a Spoils. Each other player gains a Ruins.

cards.name: Procession
cards.description: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly $1 more than it.

cards.name: Rats
cards.description: [Action]: Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats). [Trash]: When this is trashed, +1 Card.

cards.name: Scavenger
cards.description: You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Wandering Minstrel
cards.description: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

cards.name: Band of Misfits
cards.description: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose. This is that card until it leaves play.

cards.name: Bandit Camp
cards.description: Gain a Spoils.

cards.name: Catacombs
cards.description: [Action]: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 cards. [Trash]: When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

cards.name: Count
cards.description: Choose one: Discard 2 cards; put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper. Choose one: +$3; trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

cards.name: Counterfeit
cards.description: When you play this, you may play a treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that treasure.

cards.name: Cultist
cards.description: [Action]: Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand. [Trash]: When you trash this, +3 cards.

cards.name: Graverobber
cards.description: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from $3 to $6, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to $3 more than it.

cards.name: Junk Dealer
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand.

cards.name: Mystic
cards.description: Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it�s the named card, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Pillage
cards.description: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose. Gain 2 Spoils.

cards.name: Rebuild
cards.description: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to $3 more than it.

cards.name: Rogue
cards.description: If there are any cards in the trash costing from $3 to $6, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest.

cards.name: Altar
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $5.

cards.name: Hunting Grounds
cards.description: [Trash]: When this is trashed, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

cards.name: Knights
cards.description: One of each, all shuffled into one Kingdom pile.

cards.name: Candlestick Maker
cards.description: Take a Coin token.

cards.name: Stonemason
cards.description: [Action]: Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it. [Overpay]: When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

cards.name: Doctor
cards.description: [Action]: name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash the matches. Put the rest back on top in any order. [Overpay]: When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each $1 you overpaid, look at the top card of your deck; trash it, discard it, or put it back.

cards.name: Masterpiece
cards.description: When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain a Silver per $1 you overpaid.

cards.name: Advisor
cards.description: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.

cards.name: Herald
cards.description: [Action]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Action, play it. [Overpay]: When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each $1 you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Plaza
cards.description: You may discard a Treasure card. If you do, take a Coin token.

cards.name: Taxman
cards.description: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to $3 more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Baker
cards.description: [Action]: Take a Coin token. [Setup]: Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.

cards.name: Butcher
cards.description: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

cards.name: Journeyman
cards.description: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

cards.name: Merchant Guild
cards.description: While this is in play, when you buy a card, take a Coin token.

cards.name: Soothsayer
cards.description: Gain a Gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.
